summary.title: Default Mode
summary.subtitle: Get Started Quickly
summary.first-point: Start with presets that offer a privacy/comfort balance that suits most. Berty nodes are used to improve performance and asynchronous communication.
summary.second-point: Push notifications are enabled by default and you can't disable them yet on iOS.
summary.third-point: For a custom privacy/comfort balance, select Custom Mode.

summary.title: Custom Mode
summary.subtitle: Custom Privacy/Comfort Balance
summary.first-point: In this mode, adjust all settings individually to create the balance of privacy and comfort that works for you.
summary.second-point: For a turnkey experience, select Default Mode.

errors.multiaddr-p2p: The multiaddress should contain a p2p

good-to-know.title: Good to know:
good-to-know.second-point: Nickname is optional and can be changed later

generate-key.title: Starting the Berty node‚Ä¶
generate-key.desc: This might take a few seconds

setup-finished.title: Setup finished!
setup-finished.desc: You can now use the app, start adding contacts and talk freely and privately with them

web-views.title: Web content permission
web-views.desc: Berty is about to load content from the web. Do you want to open this page?

home.title: Berty
home.no-contacts: You don't have any contacts or chat yet

no-network.title: No Network Found!
no-network.description: You look offline! Activate Bluetooth feature to chat with friends!

create-group-finalize.first-bullet-point: Anyone in the group can rename it or invite new members
create-group-finalize.second-bullet-point: You can invite members by link
create-group-finalize.fifth-bullet-point: You cannot remove a member from this group

edit-profile.title: Edit my profile
edit-profile.qr-will-update: Your Berty ID (QR code) will be updated
edit-profile.ocr-wont-update: Your pending contact requests won‚Äôt be updated

delete-account.title: Delete account!
delete-account.first-desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

log-button.name: Log format
log-button.bullet-point: Restart app after changing this field

log-filters-button.name: Log filters
log-filters-button.bullet-point: Restart app after changing this field

share-button.title: Share ID on discord
share-button.alert-title: Do you want to share your QR code to "#dev-logs" on the Berty Discord server?
share-button.alert-message: This will allow other staff to scan your QR code or copy your contact link.

tyber-host-button.name: Tyber
tyber-host-button.bullet-point: Restart app after changing this field

manage-deep-link.contact-already-added-message: You can't add same contact multiple times

save-theme.title: Saving theme
save-theme.desc: Please choose a name for your theme!

push-notifications.title: Notifications
push-notifications.check-device-settings: This conversation is set to receive push notifications, but alerts have been disabled in the system settings of your device
push-notifications.check-account-settings: Notifications are disabled, check your account settings

warning-disable.title: Do you want to activate this feature?
warning-disable.subtitle: Once enabled, push notifications can't be disabled for a specific conversation.

push-notifications.why-cant-disable: Push notifications can't be muted for a specific conversation
push-notifications.why-cant-disable-account: Push notifications can't be muted but you can use the OS settings to mute Berty notifications globally.

errors.no-token: Your device is not compatible with push notifications
errors.no-server: You must register a push relay first

warning-enable-all.title: Enable push notification for all conversations?
warning-enable-all.subtitle: This will also enable notifications for the conversations you join in the future

push-notifications.auto-enable: Enable push for current and future conversations

contact-request-box.title: Contact request
contact-request-box.error: Error adding you to the group ‚òπÔ∏è Our bad!

infos-chat.outgoing: Waiting for your contact reply to connect!

one-to-one.incoming-input-placeholder: Accept the request to write here...

opening.alert-push-go-failed: An error occurred while registering for the Berty Push Notification service.
opening.alert-push-fetch-failed: Unable to connect to the Berty Push Notification service.
opening.alert-push-perm-denied: The permission request for Push Notification has been denied.
opening.alert-push-desc: You can try to activate this feature again in Settings at any time.

notification.title: Push Notifications
notification.desc: Berty app need your permission to send you local or push notifications. This will allow you to be inform when you receive a message.

proximity.title: Bluetooth Messaging
proximity.android-desc: To exchange messages offline via Bluetooth even when the app is in the background, the Android API requires the location permission to be granted. We do not use your location data in any way.
proximity.ios-desc: To exchange messages offline via Bluetooth, the iOS API requires permission to be granted.

camera.title: Camera
camera.desc: Do you want to authorize the camera to take pictures or scan QR codes?

audio.title: Audio Messages
audio.desc: To send audio message to your contacts, you need to allow microphone permission to Berty app.

gallery.title: Image Messaging
gallery.desc: To send images to your contacts, you must authorize Berty to access photos and other media stored on your device.

permission.settings-text: You can enable {{title}} permission from Settings.

need-restart.title: Restart required
need-restart.desc: Restart Berty to save your data and enable notifications!

wtf-screen.title: What's the Fail?
wtf-screen.desc-report: Click the button to quit and restart the app.

sorry-screen.title: Sorry for this bug!
sorry-screen.desc: It's the fault of Francis, intern developer at Berty, who must have made a mistake. What a jerk this Francis!
sorry-screen.desc-em: *Well, okay, there's no Francis at Berty's team.
sorry-screen.desc-report: Click on the button to quit and restart the app.

action-delete.file-exists: Account {{accountId}} does not exists, a file has this name though.
action-delete.fs-read-error: Error while getting FS info about account

share.sharing-id-message: Let‚Äôs chat on Berty, a secure & p2p messaging app. Join me here:
